newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh taka eases slightly at close.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh taka eases slightly at close.

text.p: The Bangladesh taka closed marginally weaker at 42.8200/8300 to the dollar in interbank trading on Thursday against a previous close of 42.8150/8250, dealers said.
The taka was quoted at 42.8150/8300 per dollar in early trade. Dealers said increased purchases by some private banks had kept it under slight pressure throughout the session.

Call rates lost an early edge in absence of major players, closing weaker at 6.5 to 7.5 percent against previous 7.5-8.5 percent. Bank transactions in Bangladesh close by midday on Thursdays. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
